code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import Chart from'chart.js/auto';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var April22=function April22(){useEffect(function(){var chartData={labels:['April 02','April 04','April 05','April 06','April 07','April 12','April 18','April 20','April 22','April 25','April 27'],datasets:[{label:'Expenses',data:[800,7002,0,2750,0,3760,0,4000,0,0,4000],borderColor:'red',backgroundColor:'red',fill:false},{label:'Income',data:[6875,12000,2,600,1000,0,13000,7000,1930,8500,0],borderColor:'green',backgroundColor:'green',fill:false}]};var options={scales:{xAxes:[{scaleLabel:{display:true,labelString:'Date'}}],yAxes:[{id:'y-axis-1',position:'left',scaleLabel:{display:true,labelString:'Expenses (in thousands)'},ticks:{beginAtZero:true,stepSize:2,callback:function callback(value){return"".concat(value,"k");}}},{id:'y-axis-2',position:'right',scaleLabel:{display:true,labelString:'Income (in thousands)'},ticks:{beginAtZero:true,stepSize:2,callback:function callback(value){return"".concat(value,"k");}}}]}};var canvasRef=document.getElementById('myChart');var chart=new Chart(canvasRef,{type:'line',data:chartData,options:options});return function(){chart.destroy();};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{id:"myChart",style:{maxWidth:'900px',maxHeight:'400px'}});};export default April22;
